data.prayer: Spirit, help the 57,060 believers find a person of peace today among the 134,739 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manchester, Jamaica
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Manchester, Jamaica to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.section_summary: On average, 11 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Manchester, Jamaica.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Manchester.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Manchester that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Mandeville
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Mandeville, Manchester, Jamaica.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Manchester, Jamaica that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in Manchester, Jamaica to the gospel today.
Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Manchester, Jamaica.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,
